sentences: Emil Reesen (30 May 1887 – 27 March 1964) was a Danish composer, conductor and pianist.
He made his debut as a concert pianist in 1911 and was employed as a conductor for the Danish Radio Symphony Orchestra in 1927.
In 1931 he also began working as a ballet conductor at the Royal Danish Theatre.
Emil Reesen was the father of the composer Morten Reesen (1928–1961) and the great-uncle of the composer Frederik Magle (his sister's grandson).
1928 Variationer over et tema af Schubert
